comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Juliana Reiser Force (1876-1948), American art administrator, assistant to Gertrude Vanderbilt Whitney, director of the Whitney Museum of American Art. "Juliana Force was imperious, homely and witty, with an erratic eye, a terrible temper and an absolute commitment to her cause." (Roxana Robinson, from her 1990 New York Times review of the book Rebels on Eighth Street: Juliana Force and the Whitney Museum of American Art by Avis Berman.)

comment.author: 45575110@N08
comment._content: Nice portrait. A lovely time in history to be remembered!
